page.title: 08Chelmer Village
page.content: Chelmer Village has been built just outside{Chelmsford}town.Chelmsford has a good train station which runs a frequent,fast service to London which is only 30 miles away.Chelmer Vilage has a good range of{houses}for all ages,from pensioners and unmarried people needing single bedroomed flats to family houses.{The Village {Centre}has a supermarket called Asda and some other shops and a friendly Inn.There are lots of{play parks}but unfortunatly they have been ruined by graffiti.Chelmer Village has its own { {Village hall}which caters for some of these clubs,Brownies,Dancing,Gymnatics and the once monthiy family discos. Chelmer Village has a{modern primary {school}which most of the children go to. Although Chelmer Village is very built up there is a peaceful countryside all around it.
